Text:
Downloaded, installed, used key, converted an xvid to dvd, burned and..........PERFECT!!!!

Thanks for the upload!!!!

Took myself offline, blocked the program with my firewall and pasted in the serial with a name and it has worked like a charm, everything is activated and am happy with this d/l.

Great work scene4all.
Oh yea, also props to Laxity, which i believe was the Cracker.

Hi there,
It worked perfect at the start. One day I forgot and I connected to internet while the app was running. Since then it changed to "unregistered" and fails to register even if I disconnect from internet.

I did an uninstall, cleaned the registry and file system. Restarted the PC (Win7-64) and tried to install while disconnected from internet, but NOWAY. 

I even tried to install the cracked version of (6.2.3.0622 + Rus) and changed replaced with cracked dll but it somehow is still aware and wants to register. 

I mean when clicking on "Register" it tries to verify and then says that It failed to connect to internet...

:(

Thanks for uploading.
@GangstaFari: same happened to me, this is useless if/when you are connected to the net.

in fact, it is useless when you are not connected to the net either because the creator goes to the net for registration and if you are not connected it will not register you. The copy express part does not uninstall unless you are connected. This is seriously bescheiĂen I would not install xilisoft anything on my computer.
Thank you so much ,great application , working well.
